description: Ends early so you can do motion glider.
Use it just before the left curb ends.
Use it just behind the first torch.
Drift off completely sideways to deactivate the glider, then the bullet will not slow down at the end of the cannon section.
Use it at the 2nd flying thing.
Use it next to the red flag on the right.
Don't use it any later, or you will skip the item set.
Hop deep into the shortcut, or else it will do a bad shortcut.
Use it at the first coin.
This is the 2nd white shortcut on the right.
Use it right before the item set.
Use it right before the item set.
Use it after passing both dark lines on the ground.
If you use it in this section, go underwater on the right to avoid the top path.
Use it in the shortcut after bagging at the 2nd item set.
Hop deep into the shortcut, or else the bullet will not take the shortcut.
Use it at the first enemy.
Use it right after the final grass patch.
Hop deep into the shortcut, or else the bullet will not extend.
Use it when the curb begins on the right.
Having the bullet take the final shortcut is inconsistent.
Use it right after landing from the 1st trick ramp.
Use it after the cannon, at the 3rd black line on the ground.
Use it at the 1st black line on the ground after the boost panel.
Use it before the item set on lap 3.
Use it at the sharpest turn.
Use it at the 3rd pink sign.
Right after the 3rd coin.
Hop far into the gap, but don't drop down too far or the bullet will fall too.
Hop into the shortcut.
Don't hold any direction on the stick, and the bullet will take the shortcut.
Don't hold any direction on the stick, and the bullet will take the shortcut.
Do a mini-turbo hop + another hop in the grass.
Use it right before going into the water.
Use it right after going into the glider.
Use it on lap 2 before the water.
Use it on lap 3 in the second half of the grass shortcut.
Use it at the end of lap 1, after the pillar on the left.
Use it on lap 2 at the row of coins. Hold right on the stick to end at the boost panel.
Use it on lap 3 at the first shortcut. Avoid the pillar afterwards.
Use it on lap 2 at the item box.
Use it on lap 3 at the first shortcut.
Ends right before the finish line.
Ends before the item set.
Use it at the beginning of the first turn. Ends before the item set.
Use it as soon as you touch the water. Ends right before the finish line.
Use it on lap 3 after the blue cart on the right. Ends before the last item set.
Hold right at the start to take the top path. Hold left at the end to get an item box.
Use it just before the first crack on the ground. Ends before the first item set.
Hold a right drift as the bullet ends.
Use it at the 3rd coin. Ends right before the last item set.
Use it before the last table.
Ends right before last item set.
Use it as the ground changes.
Ends before the first item set.
Drift off completely sideways to deactivate the glider, then the bullet will not slow down at the end of the cannon section.
Hop off the shortcut with an orange mini-turbo, and use the bullet after passing the the fences. Even though this is not an extension, it is extremely fast.
Drift off completely sideways to deactivate the glider, then the bullet will not slow down at the end of the cannon section.
Skips the shortcut.
Use it right after going off the ramp.
Use it right after the red floor in the pipe.
Use it right after the first ramp in the pipe. Ends right before the finish line.
Use it right after the final spin booster. Skips the first item set.
Use it on lap 1 at the final cactus.
Use it on lap 2 at the right path. Skips the item set.
Use it on lap 2 at the first item set.
Use it on lap 2 after the red arrows on the left.
Use it at the end of lap 1 or lap 2.
Use it on lap 2 at the first item set.
Use it at the stairs on lap 2.
Use it on lap 2 at the final turn's first coin.
Use it on lap 3 just before the red phone booth.
Ends right before last item set.
Ends right before the finish line.
Use it just after the sharp turn.
Ends before last item set.
Skips the last item set and the biggest shortcut.
Use it at the green pipe. Ends right before the finish line.
Ends right before the gap jump.
Ends right before the gap jump.
Use it after the gap jump. Ends before the broken item set.
Use it just before the beginning of the bridge.
Use it at the row of three spread out coins.
Use it as you enter the tunnel.
Use it at the last divider in the tunnel. Hold a right drift as the bullet ends.
Ends right before the item set.
Use it after passing the first wooden structure on the right. Ends right before the shortcut.
Use it after going off the blue ramp. Ends right before the finish line. This is about 0.7 slower than the next spot, but with more invincibility time.
Use it after passing the shadow in the offroad, or else it will not take the shortcut. This is about 0.7 faster than the previous spot, but with less invincbility time.
Use it between the first and second spin booster. Hold right to avoid the glider.
Use it at the first spin boosters.
Use it at the first coin. Ends before the item set.
Use it 2 seconds into the cannon glider.
Use at the last coin on the sharp turn.
Use it on the halfpipe instead if you need an item.
Gets an item.
Use it as soon as the ground becomes flat.
Ends right before the finish line.
Use it on lap 2 at the corner before the red bus.
Use it on lap 2 at the first taxi.
Use it on lap 3 where the wet road ends.
Use it on lap 3 at the grass shortcut. Ends after the last turn.
Use it on lap 1 or 2 at the final grass shortcut. Ends before the first item set.
Use it on lap 3 right before the ramp item set. Hold right at the end to get an item.
Use it on lap 3 right before the piranha plant. Ends before the last item set.
Use it on lap 3 at the grass Peach statue. Ends before the finish line.
Use it on lap 1 or 2 at the glider coins.
Use it on lap 3 at the corner before the piranha plant.
Use it on lap 3 before landing from the glider. Ends before the finish line.
Use it as you exit the water on lap 2.
This is a lap 2 extension.
This is a lap 3 extension.
Use it on lap 3 at the big grass shortcut. Ends before the finish line.
Use it on lap 2 at the final tree. Ends before the item set.
Use it on lap 3 at the third coin.
Use it on lap 3 befoer going down the stairs. Ends before the finish line.
Use it at the end of the first halfpipe. Skips 2 item sets.
Takes you safely past the narrow turn.
Use it as you exit the water.
Use it on lap 2 at the second set of boost panels.
Use it right before lap 3.
Use it on lap 3 at the ramp before the tube.
Use it as you pass the third tree on the right.
Use the bullet at the second rock, or else it will exit the shortcut.
Takes you safely past the cave. Ends before the item set.
Use it as the track starts to bend downwards.
Use it right after the second item set.
Use it as you reach the coins.
Use it after landing from the gap jump shortcut.
Use it as you land in the drain.
Use it in the purple shortcut.
Hop into the shortcut and use it late.
Use it before the first wafer.
Ends right before the finish line.
Skips the shortcut.
Use it after you pass the third tree on the right. Skips the shortcut.
Ends before the finish line.
Use it when the grass ends on the left.
Use it at the 2nd last vertical line on the wall. This is about 0.4s slower than the next spot, but with more invincibility time. Skips the final shortcut.
This is about 0.4s faster than the previous spot, but with less invincibility time. Skips the final shortcut.
Mushroom into the shortcut, then use the bullet before the glider ramp. It's not worth it to do this shroomless. Skips the final shortcut.
0.2s slower than using the bullet at the start of the grass.
Use it at the shadow. Ends right before the finish line.
Use it on lap 2 at the first big ramp
Use it on lap 3 at the start of the left turn.
Use it on lap 3 at the last big ramp.
Use it on lap 3 at the glider. Ends before the finish line.
Use it on lap 3 at the second conveyor.
Use it right after the second item set. Ends before the last item set.
Use it before the second shy guy. Ends before the finish line.
Ends before the second item set.
Use it next to the first coin.
Use it on lap 2 after the wet road.
This is a lap 2 extension.
Use it on lap 2 at the big grass shortcut.
Use it on lap 3 at the end of the tunnel.
Use it at the logs.
Use it on lap 3 after landing on the conveyors.
Use it at the top of the stairs. Ends before the shortcut.
Use it when the split path ends.
Use it after 2 tricks on the eel.
Use it next to the yellow flower on the right. You an also hop into the waterfall and use the bullet late. If you use it at any other place than these 2, the drop off point is bad.
Use it between the last item set and the sharp turn.
Use it at the 2nd piranha plant.
Ends before the last item set.
Ends before the first item set.
Use it after the ramp in the ice hole shortcut.
Use it on the first boost ramp after the second item set.
